name: The Tech Blog
description: A full stack CMS blog designed in the MVC paradigm. Users sign up and log in.  Post, update and delete blog posts. Comment on posts. Password encrypted. SQL storage.
tech: JavaScript | CSS | HTML | Node.js | Express Handlebars | Express | MySql2 | BCrypt | Dotenv | Heroku

name: Adventure Series
description: Full Stack MVC project. An MVP of a bike adventure site where competitors can submit their rides and the admin can post to a leaderboard. Log in with Strava.
tech: JavaScript | CSS | HTML | Node.js | Express Handlebars | Express-Session | MySql2 | Passport | Passport-Strava | Cookie-Parser | Connect-Session-Sequelize | Connect-Ensure-Login | Heroku

name: Weather Map
description: Planning a trip? Compare weather in your destination cities! Most-viewed cities are saved alphabetically descending in Local Storage and displayed on the page.
tech: JavaScript | CSS | HTML | Bootstrap | Open Weather Map API

name: Budget Tracker
description: A budget tracker for the traveler to keep track of expenses with or without a data connection. Can be saved as a PWA to one's device.
tech: JavaScript | CSS | HTML | Node.js | webpack | Express | MongoDB | Mongoose | Heroku

name: Code Quiz
description: A JavaScript quiz to test a user's coding knowledge. A timer counts down and wrong/correct answers are indicated. High scores saved to Local Storage.

name: Work-Day Scheduler
description: Plan your workday with this scheduling app that saves your tasks to local storage. During the hours of 9-5 tasks are color-coded to indicate past, present and future.
